Text.Page:
The Blood Guards that patrol the citadel are so numerous, we can't get through the dungeons without them ambushing our soldiers. Help us clear the way.

Take out {@LinkCreature:33#10#Blood Guard mages}, {@LinkCreature:33#11#berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:33#12#lancer}, {@LinkCreature:33#60#sorcerer}, {@LinkCreature:33#61#reaper}, {@LinkCreature:33#62#champion}, and {@LinkCreature:33#70#arcanists}.

Let Misia, the coordinator at the Infiltrators Refuge in the catacombs, know when they can send troops out again.
Your success is an inspiration to us all. Please take this reward.
The ghost guards harry us whenever we leave the base.
